name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: dfs.namenode.name.cache.threshold
description:
Frequently accessed files that are accessed more times than this
    threshold are cached in the FSDirectory nameCache.

name: fs.s3a.retry.limit
description:
Number of times to retry any repeatable S3 client request on failure,
    excluding throttling requests.

name: dfs.namenode.fs-limits.max-xattrs-per-inode
description: Maximum number of extended attributes per inode.

name: hadoop.fuse.connection.timeout
description:
The minimum number of seconds that we'll cache libhdfs connection objects
    in fuse_dfs. Lower values will result in lower memory consumption; higher
    values may speed up access by avoiding the overhead of creating new
    connection objects.

name: ipc.maximum.data.length
description:
This indicates the maximum IPC message length (bytes) that can be
    accepted by the server. Messages larger than this value are rejected by the
    immediately to avoid possible OOMs. This setting should rarely need to be
    changed.
